actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Labor Department.

official_title: A bill to prohibit age discrimination in apprenticeship programs.
short_title: Age Discrimination in Apprenticeship Programs Act
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Age Discrimination in Apprenticeship Programs Act - Amends the National Apprenticeship Act to direct the Secretary of Labor to assure that no apprenticeship program discriminates on the basis of age against any person who is between the ages of 18 and 45.

titles.title: Age Discrimination in Apprenticeship Programs Act
A bill to prohibit age discrimination in apprenticeship programs.
